name: Unbound (Chainbreaker Studio)
description:
The game follows the journey of 'Temwa', a 'Faun' whose homeland has overrun by monsters. The beasts have enslaved many of her kind and an overwhelming number of them still roam the land spreading chaos.

She has suffered heavily at the hands of these monsters and after escaping their clutches is now returning to her homeland in an attempt to find, and liberate her community. In doing so she must overcome her own mental demons as well as face the repressed memories of the abuse she survived.
